short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Navi is a Chrome extension that allows you to easily save and manage chat logs on your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Navi converts chat transcripts from OpenAI's ChatGPT site (https://chat.openai.com) into markdown format so that they can be saved on your local PC.

Main features:

- Convert the chat history of the current ChatGPT chat window to Markdown.
- Save the converted chat history to your local PC.

ChatGPT Navi has plans to extend a number of features to make ChatGPT easier to use.
The following features are planned for the next update:

- Export chat transcripts to Notion
- Capture chat transcripts as images and export them to Twitter
